description: Synthetic policy detailing account verification and security measures.

sections.title: Verification Requirements
sections.text: Users may be required to verify their identity using government-issued identification or email-based verification depending on account activity.

sections.title: Two-Factor Authentication
sections.text: Two-factor authentication must be enabled for accounts exhibiting unusual login activity or accessing sensitive services.

sections.title: Security Holds
sections.text: Accounts may be placed on temporary hold if unauthorized access is suspected. Users will be notified and must verify ownership to restore access.
